Game information:
--------------------------------


Assassin's CreedÃ‚Â® Unity - Action adventure that takes you to Paris, 
the French Revolution. You will learn the history of the Arno - young men, 
by chance became embroiled in the bloody events of the period. You are 
waiting for new opportunities in the management of character. Change and 
the appearance of objects and their characteristics. You will be able to 
play Assassin's CreedÃ‚Â® Unity with friends, and some even three jobs to 
perform. Witness the legendary historical events!


Game Features:Ã‚Â 
--------------------------------

A huge open world, an incredible level of freedom, full control movements 
of the character and the new mechanics of parkour.

A large assortment of weapons and clothing, equipment and specialized 
skills. Create unique combinations and fully develop your character 
using the new skill tree.

Updated combat mechanics, improved stealth action and special methods 
of crowd control.

Paris, one of the most beautiful cities in the world with maximum 
reliability realized on the game engine of the new generation.

Explore the house, castles and secret catacombs, to execute contracts, 
participate in a treasure hunt and murder investigations.

Go through a unique single-player campaign or invite three friends 
together to go on a trip to Paris XVIII century in the mode of playing together.
